Text:
super bedankt weer voor een geweldige up
thanks thanks

This film was made in Norwegian with a Norwegian soundtrack. Are you sure that you have found a version where the soundtrack is dubbed in English? That has never happened for other Norwegian films. And if so, is the original Norwegian not included? Here is a presentation of the Blueray production:
http://www.lovefilm.no/film/Nokas/318972/

@Kuthumi 

You're right the audio is indeed Nordic.

The translation team has given misinformation.

AUDIO=NORDIC
